title: The Decline of Grammar - analogy paragraph 2

content.question: The analogy at the end of paragraph 2 accomplishes all of the following EXCEPT:

choices.label: It continues the analogy of "continental drift" (earlier in the sentence).
It introduces an image that reappears in the last paragraph.
It implies that grammarians' work is nonessential and ineffective.
It recalls the jeremiads referred to in the opening of the passage.

content.answer: It introduces an image that reappears in the last paragraph.

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Recognize and explain the use of methods of development to accomplish a purpose.
